name: the poppy pullover
notes:
description: the poppy pullover is the perfect handmade addition to your wardrobe! this crochet pattern is designed for an oversized fit with a flattering v-neck shape and rolled short sleeves. it features cute side slits and has amazing drape. the pattern is beginner friendly and includes 9 sizes, plus a video tutorial for easy stitching.

[find the free pattern on my blog!][1]

[get the lion brand kit!][2] the kit comes with all the yarn needed to make the top plus a free copy of the pdf digital download crochet pattern! you can even customize your yarn color! 

[i also have a full video tutorial available!][3]


  [1]: https://www.eandpcrochet.com/the-poppy-pullover-crochet-pattern/
  [2]: http://shrsl.com/41w89
  [3]: https://youtu.be/cauyfuex6uy
